dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale action recognition dataset containing 60 different action classes, including daily, mutual, and health-related actions. It consists of 56,880 video samples performed by 40 distinct subjects, recorded by Microsoft Kinect v2 cameras.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: This dataset extends NTU RGB+D 60 by adding another 60 classes and another 57,600 video samples, collected from 106 performers with 32 setups at different camera locations.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
S. Song
C. Liu
Y. Li
Y. Hu
dcterms:description: A large-scale benchmark for human action analytics with almost 20,000 action samples and 5.4 million frames, consisting of two parts with different action classes and challenges.
dcterms:title: PKU Multi-Modality Dataset (PKU-MMD)

dcterms:creator: CMU
dcterms:description: A motion capture database containing 2235 skeleton sequences categorized into 45 action classes, captured using a Vicon motion capture system.
dcterms:title: CMU Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Wang
X. Nie
Y. Xia
Y. Wu
S.-C. Zhu
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1494 videos covering 10 actions, captured by Kinect cameras from three viewpoints, used for action recognition.
dcterms:title: NW-UCLA Dataset
